metadata.title: Bering Sea and the Chukchi Sea 14 KM Analyzed SST Fields

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Environmental Satellite, Data
Information Service (NESDIS), National Climate Data Center (NCDC)

metadata.description:
This data set contains SST field temperatures at 14 km resolution for the Bering Sea and the Chukchi Sea.

  The Office of Satellite Data Processing and Distribution keeps this data for a month, then sends it to the National Climatic Data Center for archiving.
metadata.notes:
